interventions.title: Peer Pressure
interventions.description:
- **Suggestion**: Encourage critical thinking and self-awareness.
   - **Example**: If friends are pressuring you to try smoking, weigh the pros and cons, remember your values, and assertively say, "I choose not to smoke because I care about my health."

interventions.title: Academic Stress
interventions.description:
- **Suggestion**: Practice time management and relaxation techniques.
   - **Example**: Create a study schedule to break up tasks, and incorporate breaks to do things you enjoy, like playing a sport or reading a book.

interventions.title: Bullying
interventions.description:
- **Suggestion**: Build a supportive network and report incidents.
   - **Example**: Confide in a trusted teacher or counselor about bullying and seek support from friends who value and respect you.

interventions.title: Identity and Self-Esteem
interventions.description:
- **Suggestion**: Explore interests and recognize personal strengths.
   - **Example**: If you're feeling uncertain about your identity, try new activities like art or sports, and focus on achievements and positive qualities.

interventions.title: Body Image Issues
interventions.description:
- **Suggestion**: Embrace body positivity and focus on health.
   - **Example**: Follow social media that promotes positive body image and practice gratitude for body functions, like being able to run or dance.

interventions.title: Relationship Challenges
interventions.description:
- **Suggestion**: Establish boundaries and communicate effectively.
   - **Example**: In a romantic relationship, discuss what makes you comfortable or uncomfortable, saying, â€œI feel better when we talk about our feelings openly.â€

interventions.title: Digital Addiction
interventions.description:
- **Suggestion**: Set boundaries on screen time.
   - **Example**: Use apps to monitor and limit time spent on social media, and designate "tech-free" times during meals or before bed.

interventions.title: Future Uncertainty
interventions.description:
- **Suggestion**: Focus on setting short-term goals.
   - **Example**: Instead of worrying about long-term career choices, set goals like joining a club or improving a skill that can lead to new opportunities.

interventions.title: Family Conflicts
interventions.description:
- **Suggestion**: Practice active listening and empathy.
   - **Example**: During arguments with parents, try to understand their perspective by saying, â€œI hear that youâ€™re concerned about my grades, let's find a solution together.â€

interventions.title: Financial Literacy
interventions.description:
- **Suggestion**: Learn basic budgeting and saving skills.
    - **Example**: Create a simple budget by listing income sources like allowance and track expenses, then decide on savings goals like buying a new gadget or a gift for a friend.

By providing these specific examples, young people can better relate to and implement the suggestions in their daily lives, promoting resilience and growth.
